name: Johnny Depth (pello)
description:
Johnny Depth is searching for a legendary Jewel called the "Ember Head" a rare blue ember stone forged in the abyss of the ocean. Avoid volcanos, dangerous fish and mines. Swim your way through the depths and use user health wisely.

You heal provides you with light, fireballs and dash power. You can recover health picking little blue embers that you must touch first and let them fall on your health bar!

Controls:

- Left click on screen to direct Johnny.

- Right click to soot a fireball: consumes health.

- Press SPACE for DASH: consumes health depending on distance
